entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:37 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -26.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Key Lake Airport 05:52 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

Visibility: 6.4 km

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
